SETTINGS_GENERAL_INFORMATION_TEXT: In order to be able to promote your brand using the Flop Ad platform, you need to provide some basic information. They will be used to display your brand in our casino directory in the Flop mobile application. You will be able to change these information from the settings panel later if necessary.
SETTINGS_POKER_ROOM_INFORMATION_TEXT: Set the general information about the games available in your poker room (tables, variants, blinds, buy-in, etc.) to be able to share these information with flop users and attract more players into your room.
SETTINGS_ADD_GAME_BUTTON: Click here to add your first game
SETTINGS_ADD_FIRST_GAME: Click here to add your first game
SETTINGS_REMOVE_GAME_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you sure delete this game?
SAVE_GENERAL_INFORMATION_ACTION_ERROR: We cannot save your general information
SAVE_POKER_ROOM_INFORMATION_ACTION_ERROR: We cannot save your poker room information
